Package com.google.appinventor.components.annotations

Defines annotations to specify component names, descriptions, properties, methods, events, permissions, categories, etc.

See: Description

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PropertyCategory
    Categories for Simple properties.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    DesignerComponent
    Annotation to mark components for use in the Designer and Blocks Editor.
    DesignerProperty
    Annotation to mark properties to be visible in the ODE visual designer.
    SimpleEvent
    Annotation to mark Simple event definitions.
    SimpleFunction
    Annotation to mark Simple functions.
    SimpleObject
    Annotation to mark Simple objects.
    SimpleProperty
    Annotation to mark Simple properties.
    SimplePropertyCopier
    Annotation to mark Simple property copiers.
    UsesAssets
    Annotation to indicate asset files required by components.
    UsesLibraries
    Annotation to indicate library files required by components.
    UsesNativeLibraries
    Annotation to indicate native library files required by components.
    UsesPermissions
    Annotation to indicate Android permissions required by components.

Package com.google.appinventor.components.annotations Description

Defines annotations to specify component names, descriptions, properties, methods, events, permissions, categories, etc.
